attributes.action: Allow people that have voted to leave the EU to change their vote
attributes.additional_details: Numerous people have claimed that they wish to change their vote because claims relating to the amount of funding that would be available to the NHS and about the ability to curb immigtation were misrepresented to the electorate during the referendum campaign.
attributes.background: We the undersigned voted to leave the EU based upon the information provided to us from the leave campaign. Critical aspects of this information now appear to be inaccurate and we wish to amend our vote.

rejection.details:
If you would like there to be a second referendum, you could sign this petition:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/133753
